scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm run build:vercel && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyRecursiveSync(src, dest) { const exists = fs.existsSync(src); const stats = exists && fs.statSync(src); const isDirectory = exists && stats.isDirectory(); if (isDirectory) { fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(childItemName => { copyRecursiveSync(path.join(src, childItemName), path.join(dest, childItemName)); }); } else { fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); } } copyRecursiveSync('build', '../build');"
